parts.name: prefix
parts.description: A slot for content before the label (e.g. an icon).

parts.name: suffix
parts.description: A slot for content after the label (e.g. an icon).

states.description: Set when the button is pressed down, either with mouse, touch or the keyboard.
Set when the button is disabled.
Set when the button is focused using the keyboard.
Set when the button is focused.
